DeleteAllGroupDescription: The selected groups will be deleted. Users in the groups will not be removed from {{productName}}. Are you sure you want to continue?
DeleteFiles: You are about to move files ({{filesCount}}) to Trash.
DeleteFilesAndFolders: You are about to delete the files ({{filesCount}}) and folders ({{foldersCount}}) to Trash.
DeleteFolders: You are about to move folders ({{foldersCount}}) to Trash.
DeleteGroupDescription: Group {{groupName}} will be deleted. Users in the group will not be removed from {{productName}}. Are you sure you want to continue?
DeleteItem: You are about to move {{name}} to Trash.
DeleteRoom: The room "{{roomName}}" will be permanently deleted. All data and user accesses will be lost.
DeleteRoomWarning: I understand the consequences and want to delete the room
DeleteTemplate: Do you really want to delete template room <1>«{{templateName}}»</1>? The template cannot be restored.
DeleteTemplates: Do you really want to delete selected room templates? They cannot be restored.
DeleteTemplateWarning: I understand the consequences and want to delete the template
FileDeletedAfter: The file will be permanently deleted in 30 days.
FilePermanentlyDeleted: The file will be permanently removed from the Trash.
FilesDeletedAfter: The files will be permanently deleted in 30 days.
FilesPermanentlyDeleted: The files will be permanently removed from the Trash.
FolderDeletedAfter: The folder will be permanently deleted in 30 days.
FolderPermanentlyDeleted: The folder will be permanently removed from the Trash.
FoldersDeletedAfter: The folders will be permanently deleted in 30 days.
FoldersPermanentlyDeleted: The folders will be permanently removed from the Trash.
ItemsDeletedAfter: These items will be permanently deleted in 30 days.
ItemsPermanentlyDeleted: These items will be permanently removed from the Trash.
removeFromListDescription: You are about to remove <1>{{title}}</1> from the list. Are you sure you want to continue?
removeFromListDescriptionPlural: You are about to remove <1>items ({{count}})</1> from the list. Are you sure you want to continue?
